mapper.select:
SELECT AUTH_CD, SYSTEM_BIT, AUTH_NM, USE_YN, REMARK FROM BMS_AUTHORITY_MST
AND AUTH_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT}, '%')
AND AUTH_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND USE_YN = #{USE_YN}
ORDER BY AUTH_CD

SELECT C.AUTH_CD, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, A.ORG_ID, B.ORG_NM FROM BMS_USER_MST A, BMS_ORG_MST B, BMS_USER_AUTH_CMPSTN C WHERE A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND C.AUTH_CD = #{AUTH_CD} ORDER BY USER_ID

SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, A.ORG_ID, B.ORG_NM FROM BMS_USER_MST A, BMS_ORG_MST B WHERE A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID AND A.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT A.USER_ID FROM BMS_USER_MST A, BMS_ORG_MST B, BMS_USER_AUTH_CMPSTN C WHERE A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND C.AUTH_CD = #{AUTH_CD})
AND A.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY A.USER_ID
SELECT AUTH_NM, AUTH_CD FROM BMS_AUTHORITY_MST ORDER BY AUTH_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BMS_AUTHORITY_MST(AUTH_CD, AUTH_NM, SYSTEM_BIT, USE_YN, REMARK ) VALUES (#{AUTH_CD}, #{AUTH_NM}, #{SYSTEM_BIT}, #{USE_YN}, #{REMARK} )
